author: ubernostrum
message:
Bump trunk to 1.4 RC 2.

git-svn-id: http://code.djangoproject.com/svn/django/trunk@17740 bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37

files.patch:
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-VERSION = (1, 4, 0, 'rc', 1)
+VERSION = (1, 4, 0, 'rc', 2)
 
 def get_version(version=None):
     """Derives a PEP386-compliant version number from VERSION."""

@@ -52,7 +52,7 @@
 # The short X.Y version.
 version = '1.4'
 # The full version, including alpha/beta/rc tags.
-release = '1.4 rc 1'
+release = '1.4 rc 2'
 # The next version to be released
 django_next_version = '1.4'

@@ -75,7 +75,7 @@ def fullsplit(path, result=None):
     author = 'Django Software Foundation',
     author_email = 'foundation@djangoproject.com',
     description = 'A high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.',
-    download_url = 'https://www.djangoproject.com/m/releases/1.4/Django-1.4c1.tar.gz',
+    download_url = 'https://www.djangoproject.com/m/releases/1.4/Django-1.4c2.tar.gz',
     packages = packages,
     cmdclass = cmdclasses,
     data_files = data_files,
